RE_NON_WORDCHARS = re.compile('\\W+')¶
RE_STARTS_WITH_DIGIT = re.compile('^\\d')¶
RE_UNDERSCORES = re.compile('_+')¶
RE_WHITESPACES = re.compile('\\s+')¶
col_map = None¶

List of 2-tuples mapping column names: (orig, my) It may happen that the name of an original column appears more than once. Therefore we cannot use a dict here.

col_types = None¶

List of data types of columns.

data_row_num = None¶

Row number of a data row. On determining data types, we use this row. On importing data, we start at this row.

header_row_num = None¶

Row number of header row

my_cols = None¶

List of my column names after cleansing

orig_cols = None¶

List of original column names

reader = None¶

Data reader.
